input_ref: CHAP API â€” application-layer YAML strip for v1.2 Render Rule
notes: Added _strip_conversational_yaml() to chap_api.py. Regex matches ```yaml response_type: conversational ... ``` blocks and removes them before returning response to user. Analytical-mode YAML blocks are preserved. Enforces v1.2 Render Rule at application layer since LLM prompt compliance alone was insufficient. Committed d3471e5, pushed to main, deployed to Linode. Required two Docker prune cycles (23GB freed total, disk went from 93% to 29%). Live test confirmed clean natural language responses with no YAML block rendered.
